iso_structural_forcing.definition: Isomorphic embeddings where VFD-org constraint diagnostics (L0–L4 ladder, perturbation sensitivity) force neuresthetics axiom tree pathways to 100% structural closure in meta-space. Core focus: Asymptotic boundaries (~99.9997% precision) promote to fixed invariants via functorial colimits, framing RH as structural necessity rather than analytic conjecture. Validated via category theory (e.g., Yoneda embeddings of obstructions) and 2025-2026 advancements (e.g., operational geometry per arXiv-inspired frameworks). Hard-to-vary invariants like improbability bounds (~10⁻¹⁶⁵) enable deterministic forcing; tetralemma probes resolve classical gaps; scores >0.999 based on unified abstractions.
handling_rules: Map diagnostics to tree pathways: Constraint ladder embeds as functors over subatomic-cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from spectral-geometric overlays (e.g., ρ=0.9997 bounds Langlands variance <0.4%).
Validate forcing: Flag classical non-closure as speculative (<0.1% variance); auto-import from vfd-org CLI outputs (e.g., rhdiag bundle).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., entropy spiral resolutions); integrate diachronic depth (Weil 1940s to 2026 toposes).
Export lean JSON; auto-export resolved obstructions to deductive_closure_module.json as invariants.
Yoneda-like embeddings consume regenerative_pool: Map asymptotic residuals into colimit equivalences for 100% closure.

properties.principle: Forcing striving for 100% invariance (hard-to-vary: rules out ~10⁻¹⁶⁵ coincidences).

sub_categories.name: Obstruction-to-Invariant Promotion
sub_categories.description: VFD perturbations (ρ drops) resolve tree residuals via improbability bounds.

examples.structure: Flat curvature at zeros forces critical line.
examples.universality: Implicational: Structural necessity over analytic limits

completeness_issues: Classical transfers bounded <0.1%; improbability rules out accidents.
gaps: Export forced invariants to RH proof manifold.
tetralemmas: Affirm diagnostic forcing/deny classical sufficiency/both in asymptotics/neither in unconstrained gaps.

changes: Synthesized from VFD-org diagnostics and neuresthetics tree; embedded 2026 structural results for full forcing.
